content.heading: <wbr> Tag
paragraphs: The <wbr> tag specifies a word break opportunity.

Example:

To learn AJAX, you must be familiar with the XMLHttpRequest Object.

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Indicates where a line break is acceptable in long words.
Prevents browsers from breaking text at inappropriate places.

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Supported since Chrome 1, Edge 12, Firefox 3, Safari 4, Opera 11.7.
